name: Escape From The Dragons
description:
What is Escape from the dragons
Escape from the dragons is a small game where you have to survive as long as you can while fighting enemies and evading
the dragons flying around the battlefield! Careful, the game will only get harder!Features
  • Stay Focused! look at the dragon movements to get ahead of their next attack.
  • Physics based gameplay. Careful, non-dragon enemies can also send you flying!
  • Think faster! The dragons will get more agressive as the player keeps evading their attacks.
  • Steam Achievements and leaderboard coming soon after release.
